sample_tickets.message: Our payment processing is completely broken. Customers can't complete purchases and we're losing sales. This started 2 hours ago.
I'd like to request a new feature - can you add integration with Slack notifications?
My invoice shows a charge I don't recognize. Can you help me understand what this $50 fee is for?
The mobile app crashes every time I try to upload a photo. I'm using iPhone 15 with iOS 17.2.
I forgot my password and the reset link isn't working. Can someone help me regain access to my account?
What are your data retention policies? I need this information for our compliance audit.
Can you explain the difference between your pro and enterprise plans? We're considering upgrading.
The dashboard is loading very slowly today. Is there a system issue or maintenance happening?
Security alert: I received an email saying my account was accessed from a suspicious location. I didn't authorize this.
How do I export my data? I can't find the export option anywhere in the interface.
